tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my first pregnancy and was very unprepared. I met the first doctor who was available at Cloudnine OAR on that particular day, and got an appointment booked for Dr. Monika Yadav. I have heard of women investing time to research and find a good gynecologist who they can connect with. I consider myself very lucky to get a doctor like Dr. Monika. She's very friendly, easy to talk to, would explain in layman's term about anything and everything you want to know from your gynec. My water broke in 34th week and had to be rushed to the hospital late in the midnight. Doc was informed and she came and visited me early in the morning, I think around 5-6 am. I was in pain for close to 18 hours. I almost gave up and was ready to go for a C section for I couldn't bear the pain anymore. But Dr. Monika gave me hope and relief and explained how beautiful and empowering it would feel after a vaginal delivery. She gave me strength and the mental power to endure the pain. I remember I literally called her every hour for some kind of update as I was hanging in pain and she would console me to not give up. And just as she promised, a vaginal delivery indeed was as beautiful as miracle. It sure is painful, but "beautiful", how Dr Monika calls it. I believe it all depends on your doc, and your comfort level with them. I would any day give her 10 stars on a rating scale of 5. I'm that happy and satisfied with her.  Dr Monika took such good care of me throughout my 7-8 months of interaction, she felt like family to me. 
To anyone reading this, she is the gynec you need!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We first met Dr. Monika during the Covid lockdown in May 2020 to discuss about our first pregnancy. Since day one she ensured that we receive all the information pertaining to the process and made extra effort to explain us things that we were not knowing. She became our friend, philosopher and guide during the entire process and thus developed an amazing bond of trust between us. She tries to put emphasis on the natural food habits and exercises to ensure that the baby grows as healthy as possible. Off course there were come complications for my wife but we were explained so well about each and every tests that we had to do or the changes in medication that we had to undergo. She was available over a call/ message always and went out of the way to ensure that we experience and enjoy the entire process together. She is kind, thoughtful and doesn't prescribe unnecessary medications nor does unnecessary scans. We were amazed to see her determination to push us for a Normal Delivery as she thought that was possible. All she asked us was for some time to ensure that my wife gets into labor as naturally as possible. We went through the labor pains, had some agitated moments as it was the first time we were experiencing something like that, but Dr. Monika was there for us always like a guiding force doing what was needed and was right for my wife at that time. 
We had a healthy baby boy through normal delivery on 14th of Feb 2021 and things went exactly how the doctor had planned for us. We continue to see her for some post natal check ups and will definitely refer her to all our known and unknown ones too. 
She is the best (Yes we did take second opinions initially just to be sure off and can say this comparing few other doctors) not only because of the profession that she is in but also for the person she is ....smiling, jovial and with loads of patience.
*** *** **** ****** *** Thank you once again from all of us :)
Regards
Pratikshya, Baby Arthav and Abhishek

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Words will fall short describing Dr. Monika. When we came to know that we are expecting our second child, we were in search of a high risk pregnancy expert as the previous one was a miscarriage in the 20th week. From the very first day, Dr. Monika explained us every minute details regarding the care to be taken. Never subscribed any extra medication. Always with her signature smile, listening to all our queries with utmost patience, given us ample amount of time during each check up. She has gone out of the way to give us her Whatsapp number in case of emergency.  Whenever in doubt, we used to ping her and to our utmost surprise, she always used to reply within minutes. The best thing about her is she remembers every minute details of what you have told her fom the first visit. This made her our friend, philosopher and guide during these crucial 9 months of pregnancy and corona time. I have developed gestational diabetes during my third trimester. She has advised me to send me all sugar readings to her everyday. It helped me to keep on a check regarding my diet. The love, care and affection she has given us in this crucial time is highly appreciated. Her comforting behavior has relaxed me and given me ample amount of strength during the operation time. We were thinking God has came in her form to deliver us our bundle of joy. Se is just an angel in the white apron. Thank you Mam for everything. May the almighty shower his precious blessings on you. Keep spreading the joy. We began as a patient and ended with becoming huge fan of her charisma. 

Tapan & Ranjita

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks a million times to Dr Monika yadav maam. We are grateful and blessed to have consulted with her for our high risk pregnancy. We had experienced preterm miscarriage in 2020. Post which we started consultation with Dr Monika and we did see lot of positivity during the course of our second pregnancy in 2021. Though this time again we had issues of short cervix but with doctor's advice and her pure dedication and true efforts we continued till 34th week and delivered healthy baby boy in jan 2022. On every single occasion where her strict decision had to be made ,she did and that helped seriously for our better being. During entire pregnancy she had been like family member and left no chance to showcase her care and professionalism. Even when my wife was on strict bedrest she managed consultation and checkups at our convenience and without a miss. Her every decision proved fruitful and most accurate. We highly recommend Dr Monika yadav for all sort of pregnancy related advice and consultation. She is gem of a person and posses high skill and extremely great attitude. Thank you so very much Monika maam. Also thanks to cloudnine hospital for having such highly skilled doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Word will be become less to explain Dr Monica Mam. She is very humble, always gives limitless time to understand our queries.
We met with her regarding my prolactin hormone issue in cloudnine hospital old airport road branch. We were so afraid of this issue. She treated me very well and i got cured within a month and after that, I got pregnant within two menstrual cycle. She gave me diet chart and I followed her every word during my pregnancy and I did not have single pregnancy related issue. Monica mam was so much helpful and the day when my water has been broken at 10pm, she asked me to admit in emergency and she also came in hospital within half an hour. And on that day our son Arush born. I recovered very soon and it was happened only for doctor mam. I always got lots of positive energy from her which helped me to heal my wound. We will be grateful to her for whole life to give us our lifetime happiness and we always want that God always should be with her and blessed her lots of bliss. THANK YOU MAM.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to Dr. Monika by chance as walk in patients. From the very first appointment we found her to extremely friendly, approachable and patient. As first time parents to be we had endless lists of questions at every visit and every single time she would take the time to answer each question great patience and a smile. Every time there was a problem, she would be there to ensure everything was sorted. Even regarding scan reports,  blood tests results etc. And she always took the time to follow up on each thing personally. As the date for delivery drew nearer,  we panicked and requested for a C section. But she took the time to convince and counsel both my husband and me to try and do a normal delivery.  Thanks to her I had an almost pain free, beautiful birth experience with the bare minimum pain. Even post birth, she has taken the time to visit us in the room and also follow up personally once we were back home. Apart from her medical expertise,  her bedside manner and emotional support are commendable.  I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Monika - Many of your patients have recommended you as a good doctor. But We are going one step further to also to recommend you as a great Doctor and a extraordinary Human being.

More than a good doctor, We value the fact that you were a good listener. More than being just professionals, we value the fact that your attitude was exceptional. 

The very thought of hospitalization is scary and traumatizing. But caring doctors like you make it friendly and pleasing. You always treat us as your family. Thanks for your effective analysis and diagnosis. 

Thanking you for teaching us the difference between Fact and Faith: Fact is when any ordinary doctor diagnoses illness in a report. Faith is when a great doctor like you give their patients the strength to recover. Else, We would never have been able to became a parent of bliss.

You have been much more to us than just a doctor. You have been my therapist, supporter, friend, well wisher and angel in disguise.

Many Thanks.
Regards,
Anuradha and Subhransu

tags: None
review: I had a highly disappointing experience with Dr K Monica Yadav. *** **** *** *** ***** *********** ***** ******* ****** *********** ** ************** *** *** **** ****** ** **** *** * ****** ********** **********  Her assistant told us that doctor is busy and She can‚Äôt meet us to review the reports. This lack of communication and professionalism is concerning and unacceptable. Patients deserve transparency and respect for their time and resources. I strongly advise others to consider alternative healthcare providers who prioritize patient care and communication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a high-risk pregnancy and my gynecologist Dr. Monika Yadav was an absolute godsend throughout the entire process. From the moment I first met with her, I felt completely at ease and confident in her abilities. She was incredibly knowledgeable and empathetic towards my condition, taking the time to answer all of my questions and address any concerns I had.

When it came time to deliver my twin girls in November 2022, she worked tirelessly to ensure that both babies were delivered safely and without complications. I truly believe that her expertise and dedication to her work are the reason why I have two healthy, happy babies today.

I can't recommend my gynecologist highly enough. She is a true professional who genuinely cares about her patients, and I feel so grateful to have had her by my side throughout my pregnancy and delivery.

Thanks Dr.Monika Yadav!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Exercise,
review: I want to thank you Monika mam for providing special care to me and my family thoroughout my pregnancy. I was so anxious about my delivery as it was premature,  but due to doctor, it went really well. She went over and above to make me feel comfortable. It can't be easy without her support and care.Your staff has consistently shown me top notch professionalism with maintaining a "human kindness".The superb care you provided is one the many reason I'm poud to put my trust in such a fantastic clinic. I am beyound thankful for my son.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted doctor Monika for treatment of ovarian cyst. While other doctors blindly recommended a surgery for rhe removal of cyst, doctor monika was true enough to guide me that my cyst could be treated without any surgery. Not running after targets or money and being truthful, kind and helpful to the patient is one of the best quality of dcotor monika. She also ensures that all the details are explained to the patient and doesn't hesitate in spending time with the patient to listen to their symptoms. 
During  my pregnancy in the covid times, doctor monika was very understanding and guided me morally as well as medically and kept me motivated in the challenging times. 
I would highly recommend consulting doctor Monika ** *** ** *** ** *** **** *** *********** ******* * **** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"Dr. Monica" energytic smile, huge bunch of positivity, work dedication, patience in clearing all our silly doubts, mentoring, friendliness what else is required from a doctor she was available for us 24/7 throughout my journey of pregnancy. She loves to spend quality time with her patients. 

Being a first time parents to be we had a endless list of questions she use to explain each and everything with lot of patience and love.  she has prepared both of us mentally for the big day. It is really enough if we follow her advise and provided exercises. Mine was a bit risky preganancy she always holded our hands in difficult situation.They way she handled me in labour ward will be cherished forever. I owe a big thanks to  you mam. You are really a boon to us and we love you mam ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We started consulting Dr.Monika from the beginning and in our first visit itself, she made us comfortable. We being first-time parents had little knowledge and even questions, but she explained everything in detail. The best part was even during those covid times she was never in a rush. We wanted a normal delivery. She was patient and guided us through this experience perfectly. In the end, it was successful and I was able to deliver naturally. She made our pregnancy journey very smooth. Throughout these 9 months, the doctor was always approachable. She is a very good listener and is one of the most polite doctors I have met, she treats her patient very nicely and gives them proper time. Highly Recommended. thank u so much Monika mam for being there always for us...for making this journey so beautiful for us... :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Monika is a great human being no matter how busy she will but she will be available 24*7 if any help required.
I was quite nervous with my pregnancy as it was my first pregnancy and went to her after checking reviews on practo..and yes I made a great choice by choosing her.

On 8 Oct I delivered a baby boy  normally with her support and motivation.

Now a days Its very rare to see a doctor like her who supports a lot and motivated.

Thank you will not enough for her.but still thank you mam for all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Monica mam has been quite helpful to me all through my pre-pregnancy and pregnancy period. She listened to our concern with lot of patience and provided us right guidance during the pre-pregnancy period. This instilled confidence in us and hence we continued to consult her after conceiving. During these difficult times of COVID, she shared her personal contact details and reverted to all our adhoc queries all the time. She has been giving us the appropriate guidance at every stage of my pregnancy. Thank you doctor for your patience, support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Family Planning,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I would like to bow and thank my wife's Gynecologist Dr. Kumari Monika Yadav. I don't think there is one and have never met a doctor so humble and empathetic. Not only during the delivery that she helped us, but through the whole year of pregnancy and a few months earlier when we started consulting her. She hasn't been just a doctor to us, but has looked after my wife as a guardian. She made sure my wife was doing well, eating properly, etc during her entire pregnancy. My wife and I will always be in her debt, and no thank you will ever be enough to show how much we respect her for her selfless support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I initially started visiting Monika Mam October 2019 and unfortunately I had an early miscarriage. Doctor was very understanding and gave us as much comfort as possible in our visit. Later when I conceived in 2020, I waited particularly only for Monika mam because of the confidence and comfort she gave us in our previous unfortunate incident. This time all went smooth and every visit she made sure to spend atleast 20-30 mins and even more if required to clarify all our apprehensions. She suggested daily exercise routines to delivery normally. Such a great support through out and I delivered normally. She even made sure to rush to hospital for delivery and was with us through our Labour. Thank you so much mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Very Happy and Satisfied with the way Dr Monika handled my pre as well as post pregnancy treatment along with any of my queries.
She was the ony reason due to which me and my husband made our minds and took the discussion to get admitted and go through my pregnancy process in the Cloudnine, Old Airport Road - branch only. As we were really very satisfied the way she treated me, and due to her great treatment we our now proud parents of a beautiful and healthy daughter üôÇüôÇ

Thank You very much Dr. Monika Yadavüòäüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr. Monica for a complex case of ectopic pregnancy which was very difficult to identify in the beginning, what impressed us most about Dr. Monika was how friendly and involved she was in the case from the beginning. She patiently explained everything and also counselled me as my emotions were all over the place during that phase. I finally landed up having a surgery which I was very scared of but being in the hands of not only a good doctor but also a warm compassionate human being really helped me get through the phase. I will always be grateful to Dr. Monika for handling my case so well and being so warm and patient with me. God bless you Dr. Monika, you were an angel in a very difficult phase of my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: There were 2 occasions where I was under care of Dr. Monika & both times she was extremely caring , curtious and not to mention great doctor who kept me updated about my situation and procedure which we're about to be done in advance . She was there with me during my 13 hrs of labor making me feel relaxed and assuring I was in good hands . Both me and my husband are overwhelmed with the experience we received while getting treated by her and I would blindly recommend her to all my contacts for any medical assistance.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Amazing Docter! She puts entire effort to ensure  her patients issue are addressed and fixed. We had Visited for natural delivery and as committed,  she had done the natural one. 
Most Importantly she goes beyond her limits for the patients to ensure effective and efficient outcomes.
  Genuine doctor hard to find now days .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Monica was my gynac for my first pregnancy and I don't think I could have had a better doctor.  one meeting with her and as to be first time parents we knew we and our baby was in safe hands. Extremely professional and yet friendly, approachable. Is very patient and most importantly spends quality time with her patients making each consultation worthwhile. Would definitely recommend Dr Monica as one of the best I have known and surely my go to gynac!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
During third month of my wife pregnency, We went to meet doctor, From that to till delivery. She supported us in every situation. She was available 24/7. We went so many times in emergency, That time she supported my wife very well. Now Dr. is like our family. 
Thank
Monika and Prateek

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor was focusing for normal delivery from the start, she guided us with all the necessary steps and advise for normal delivery. At the time of delivery there was some criticality but still she delivered the baby normally. my wife is also healthy now without any complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Monika for Ovarian Cystectomy. She was very friendly and cares a lot. I had gone through a Surgery and it was successful. She was always available whenever I  needed and responded to my messages/calls quickly. I am very much satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Last year one of my friend suggest for Dr. Monika. It's really a great experience to meet with her. Her treatment positive attitude always boost us at critical moment. She is really a nice person *** **** **** ******* We are lucky one to meet her . It was a long journey with lots of anxiety where we get her support all time.
 Thank you Doctor and cloudnine team, hospital facilities for good support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor Monika, she is not only a doctor, she is a great human being. She is polite and friendly, take time to explain things and give moral support throughout pregnancy period. She always addressed our concern patiently.We thank Doctor Monika from bottom of our heart. We had a wonderful experience with her. We strongly recommend expectant mothers and those who are planning for pregnancy to consult Doctor Monika.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Monika mam did delivery of my first baby. Have been consulting Dr Monika from 2nd month of my pregnancy.  She is a very good personality and explains the problems or queries clearly. She is available 24/7 for her patients and replies all our queries or concerns through whatsapp promptly.  Your support and guidance during complete 9 months of pregnancy to till discharge from hospital after delivery was really appreciated. Thank you so much mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Definitely would prefer and refer Dr monika kumari yadav for all healthy and happy pregnancy journey.

Dr Monika is a very friendly doctor who hand held me during pregnancy time. She was always available for any help/clarification over phone/in-clinic and her explanation of any development during the nine months was detailed and with care.
She really made my pregnancy experience very smooth.
Definitely would recommend her for her professionalism and encouragement for normal child birth.We were so lucky to have her as our Doctor.

review:
I feel so lucky to have Monika ma'am as my gynecologist throughout my pregnancy journey.
She guided us like a family member. Gave us right guidance and held our hands in difficult times. She prepared me well for the delivery day with right exercises and positive mindset. During delivery also she motivated me to keep trying and she made sure I have a normal delivery . She guided through post pregnancy as well. tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A day before yesterday I am blessed with a baby girl and that to be in normal delivery . In my case it was a miracle . And all credit goes to my dr Monica yadav . Her supportive nature and process of taking care of her patients is really appreciable . I am very lucky that she delivered my baby . We couldn't find a doctor like her especially in Bangalore for sure . Again thank you so much Dr .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is my review after 50 days of having a healthy baby delivered by VAG Del. I am grateful for the wonderful experience I had, and I would definitely return to Dr. Monika in the future.I visited three different OB-GYNs before finding Dr. Monika (she's the best). During each visit, Dr. Monika has been extremely professional while also being extremely personable, ensuring that all of my concerns were addressed. She didn't rush me, but instead listened to me and gave me sound advice. She guided me and recommended the best physical workout, which was critical in getting my body ready for the big day, and it worked like magic.Thank you, Dr. Monika!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Meeting Dr Monika ( M- meticulous, O- observant, N- Natural, I- Intelligent, K- kind hearted, A- Affable ) has been a blessing in disguise. She is one of the most competent Doctors we have come across. She takes a very systematic approach understanding the patient needs and takes quality time to explain us in detail what to expect, when to hurry or when to take it easy and how body is adapting/reacting. She anticipates our feelings, anxiety, thoughts and has been there every step of the process 24x7. She is indeed a part of our family & lives who has made the twin pregnancy ride so smooth despite the complications. Love & Regards from all of us and we wish you alot of success ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Really it is a blessing to find such a Doctor during pregnancy... Such a wonderful and caring Doctor...  She explains everything which is required for us clearly with such a friendly talk. Responds to all our queries immediately.. and apart from everything the care and motivation during labour is something which every pregnant women will expect  and she satisfies that to the core .. which is so soothing in that delivery pain.. To be precise she is such a beautiful mother for us throughout the pregnancy..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** ****** she took us through the journey with atmost care and professionalism , she explained us everything in detail involved my husband on every step with so much attention that we had no reason to worry but only live through it and enjoy the time being.When she found that there was less chance of natural delivery , she informed us about it and gave us the confidence .She made sure both me and the baby are healthy , while she was present at every moment giving us the confidence that we lacked.she's so pleasant , caring , determined , kind hearted and the best doctor out there,who will definitely give you more time than anticipated, and makes your time worthwhile.We are really grateful to have consult Monika Yadav as our gynecologist .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
****** ******* *** ***** Friendly to talk to and gave reasonable advice, if you get to.meet her as per appointment.  The receptionist and doctors are not punctual in their commitments. They take the patient's time and money for granted. I was cancelled twice for appointment, once for Dr Ritu and once for Dr Monica. Receptionist says they will.come.tofay but when you reach on time, they.announce that doctor was unable to come as she had an emergency. Because of this, I had to see 2 different doctors, and both have different advice for same problem.
I finally ended up quitting this hospital and going somewhere else. 
Not a good experience for a pregnant women!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
My wife was not keeping well post delivery and was in full stress... Monika madam talked to her and made her understand how things change post delivery and strongly she was behaving during her delivery. Further she was complaining about some water movement in her stomach and Monika madam took care of her issue. 
Best thing about Monika madam is that she greeted her as a family member and that helped her calm down and talk freely with her. 
We are thankful to god to have you around as a friend who understood us in all stages of Nishi‚Äôs pregnancy- pre delivery/during delivery and post delivery. 
We love you Monika di. 

Thanks,
Achyutam/ Manish & Nishi

review: I consulted Dr. Monica Yadav initially about my irregular periods when I was trying to get pregnant. I had to switch doctors since I moved out of Bangalore during corona. She is friendly, to the point and explains in detail the issue and pros and cons of the treatments she suggests. Highly recommend her for any Gyn issues.
